episode: Awhile back I noticed a really weird mole start to grow on my skin.  I kept putting off getting it checked and when I finally decided to get it looked at I was pretty anxious about it possibly being skin cancer.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm really glad that mole was nothing to worry about.  I remember suddenly feeling pretty anxious about it being skin cancer or something.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm relieved to hear it wasn't serious! That must be a big weight off your shoulders.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was.  It was weird though, I wasn't worried about it at first but then suddenly one day I kind of panicked and thought I might have waited too long.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's understandable to feel that way. I'm glad it turned out okay.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah it was fine, but I do have a family history of skin cancer so it's something I have to be on the look out for.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's important to stay vigilant.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Indeed.  I should stay vigilant but I don't want to freak out every time some minor thing comes up.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Finding a balance is key.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It also sucks that health care is so expensive.  Even with insurance I can't afford to go to the doctor for everything.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That can be really tough.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I wonder if there are some free AI tools that can give you a skin check?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's worth checking online for reputable options.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah I bet that's a thing now.  I should definitely look into that for next time.  If it's cheaper and gives faster results, that would be great because the waiting was the worst part.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a smart plan.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The whole situation really reminds me how much we take our health for granted

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, it's easy to forget until something happens.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah.  And there are things far more serious than skin cancer so at least I haven't had to deal with anything worse yet.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: True, that's a relief.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Hopefully if anything else happens I will be a little better prepared now.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a good approach.
